verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> concerning the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> before that <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H4325>Behold,<s%> waters rise <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and shall become an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H5158>stream,<s%> and shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> and all that is <S%H4393>therein,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> and those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H120>therein;<s%> and the men shall <S%H2199>cry,<s%> and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H3213>wail.<s%>

At the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8161>stamping<s%> of the <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> of his <S%H47>strong<s%> <S%H7494>ones,<s%> at the rushing of his <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> at the <S%H1995>rumbling<s%> of his <S%H1534>wheels,<s%> the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6437>don't<s%> look back to their <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H7510>feebleness<s%> of <S%H3027>hands;<s%>

because of the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H935>comes<s%> to <S%H7703>destroy<s%> all the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H6865>Tyre<s%> and <S%H6721>Sidon<s%> every <S%H5826>helper<s%> who <S%H8300>remains:<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> will <S%H7703>destroy<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H339>isle<s%> of <S%H3731>Caphtor.<s%>

<S%H7144>Baldness<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H5804>Gaza;<s%> <S%H831>Ashkelon<s%> is brought to <S%H1820>nothing,<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of their <S%H6010>valley:<s%> how long will you cut <S%H1413>yourself?<s%>

<S%H1945>You<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> how long will it be <S%H3808>before<s%> you be <S%H8252>quiet?<s%> Put <S%H622>up<s%> yourself into your <S%H8593>scabbard;<s%> <S%H7280>rest,<s%> and be <S%H1826>still.<s%>

How can you be <S%H8252>quiet,<s%> since <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has given you a <S%H6680>command?<s%> Against <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and against <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H2348>seashore,<s%> there has he appointed <S%H3259>it.<s%>
